content: I think I'll start with one shop and see how it goes. I don't have a huge collection of vintage posters yet, and I can always split them out later if needed. By the way, speaking of the art exhibit I attended at the local museum, I was really inspired by the use of lighting and color in the impressionist paintings. I've been flipping through the book I bought at the gift shop, and it's giving me some great ideas for my own art projects.
